```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dragracer)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

```

```{r warning=FALSE}
rpdr_contestants %>%
  separate(hometown, c('hometown', 'homestate'),',') %>%
  write.csv(., file = "~/Rupaul_Project/episodes.csv")


```

```{r}
rpdr_ep %>%
  separate(airdate, c('year','month', 'date'), '-')%>%
  write.csv(., file = "~/Rupaul_Project/episodes.csv")
```

```{r}
rpdr_contep %>%
  write.csv(.,file = "~/Rupaul_Project/constestants_ep.csv")

```
